{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated \$1.4M in 2021-2022 on contracts with WORKPLACE HEALTH AND COST SOLUTIONS.
{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}

- [Workplace Health and Cost Solutions](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Workplace%20Health%20and%20Cost%20Solutions%22)
